page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On Monday 23rd June, 1985, I lay in bed awake. Soon my dad came in and said that it was time to get up. I didn't really want to get up so I lay in bed a little longer. My sisters, Debbie and Esther were also lying in bed. Grace was in Sussex with my elder brother Graham. She was looking after an old lady. Philip, my eldest brother was at Birmingham University. Derek and Stephen were already up doing other things, probably reading. We got up and got dressed. Soon Derek came in and told me I had to do my job. We each have a job. Grace normally makes the tea. Derek lays the tray, putting the cups, milk, sugar and teaspoons on. I lay the table in the morning and Debbie lays it in the afternoon.
